attributes.background: Bullying is on the increase and in a few circumstances it is leading to people including children taking their own lives. In many cases assault is part of that bullying and is been carried out by minors. This can not continue. Bullys need to face consequences no matter their age.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar to the following petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/161936

You might want to consider supporting this petition.
